title: Add Santanu Sir profile image

requirements.text: Add the uploaded image 'image (2)-6.jpg' as Santanu Sir's profile photo in the Teachers section, replacing the current placeholder avatar
acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded image is saved as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/
Santanu Sir's profile card in the Teachers component displays the new image instead of the placeholder
The image maintains proper aspect ratio and fits within the teacher card design
The image loads correctly on both desktop and mobile viewports

constraints: Use the exact uploaded image file without modifications
Maintain the existing Teachers component structure and styling
Do not modify other teacher profiles (Sonali Ma'am, Abhijit Da)
nonGoals: Creating a dynamic image upload system for teacher profiles
Modifying the backend or adding image storage endpoints
Changing the layout or design of the Teachers section
